string-array.name: add_ingredients_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"search for\" and then an ingredient name
After searching for an ingredient try saying \"add\" and then the name of a displayed ingredient
Try saying \"save\" to return to the home screen and add your ingredients to there
Try saying \"clear ingredients\" to clear the ingredients list
Try saying \"delete\" and then an ingredient name to remove it from your list
Try saying \"back\" to return to the home screen

string-array.name: main_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"add ingredient\"
Try saying \"search\" to initiate a recipe search
Try saying \"clear ingredients\" to clear the ingredients list
Try saying \"delete\" and then an ingredient name to remove it from your list
Try saying \"go to settings\"

string-array.name: recipe_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"read next\" and then \"nutrient\", \"ingredient\" or \"instruction\"
Try saying \"view web page\"
Try saying \"back\" to return to the recipe search results screen

string-array.name: recipe_list_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"view\" and then a recipe name
Try saying \"back\" to return to the home screen

string-array.name: recipe_web_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"back\" to return to the recipe screen

string-array.name: settings_voice_hints
string-array.item: Try saying \"diet vegan\"
Try saying \"restrict to chosen ingredients\"
Try saying \"restrict calories 750\"
Try saying \"save\" to save your settings and return to the home screen
Try saying \"back\" to return to the home screen
